å…¥é—¨ - AnimatedDrawing.paths(ä»åœ¨å®éªŒä¸­)

é€šè¿‡å°†Pathå¯¹è±¡ç›´æ¥æä¾›ç»™çª—å£å°éƒ¨ä»¶ï¼Œå³ä½¿åœ¨åŠ¨ç”»æœŸé—´ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åŠ¨æ€æ›´æ”¹å…ƒç´ ã€‚ æ¯æ¬¡çŠ¶æ€æ›´æ”¹æ—¶éƒ½ä¼šé‡å»ºå†…éƒ¨æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¦‚æœpathsä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ æ•°é‡éå¸¸é«˜(è§é™åˆ¶)ï¼ŒåŠ¨ç”»æ€§èƒ½å¯èƒ½ä¼šå—åˆ°å½±å“ã€‚ ä¸ä¹…å°†æä¾›æ›´å¤šç¤ºä¾‹(ç°åœ¨è¯·å‚é˜… Example_01and Example_04).

  AnimatedDrawing.paths(
      [
     ///Path objects
      ],
      paints:[
     ///Paint objects (optional), specifies a [Paint] object for each [Path] element in `paths`.
      ],
      run: this.run,
      duration: new Duration(seconds: 3),
      onFinish: ()=> setState((){
        this.run  = false;
      }),
    )

ç›®å‰çš„é™åˆ¶:

å¦‚ä¸Šæ‰€è¿°ï¼Œå¯¹äºçª—å£å°éƒ¨ä»¶çš„æ¯ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€æ›´æ”¹ï¼Œéƒ½ä¼šé‡å»ºè·¯å¾„å¯¹è±¡çš„å†…éƒ¨æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ã€‚ å½“æä¾›çš„è·¯å¾„å¯¹è±¡çš„æ•°é‡å¾ˆå¤§å¹¶ä¸”å®šä¹‰äº†è‡ªå®šä¹‰animationOrder(è§¦å‘å¯¹æ•°æ®ç»“æ„çš„æ’åºæ“ä½œ)æ—¶ï¼Œå®ƒå¯èƒ½å¯¼è‡´æ»åã€‚ å½“é€šè¿‡å¦ä¸€ä¸ªåŠ¨ç”»ä»¥60fpsé‡å»ºçŠ¶æ€æ—¶(ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œåœ¨æ¯å¸§å¤„æ—‹è½¬è·¯å¾„å¯¹è±¡)ï¼Œè¿™å˜å¾—å°¤å…¶æ˜æ˜¾ã€‚ å…³äºå¦‚ä½•ä¼˜é›…åœ°è§£å†³è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜çš„ä»»ä½•å»ºè®®éƒ½éå¸¸å—æ¬¢è¿:-)

é€‰é¡¹åˆ—è¡¨

è¿™æ˜¯è¶Šæ¥è¶Šå¤šçš„åˆ—è¡¨ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬æ‰€æœ‰å¯ç”¨å‚æ•°åŠå…¶è§†è§‰æ•ˆæœã€‚

Field Type <pre> â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ </pre>Example<pre> â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ â€ </pre>
lineAnimation

Specifies in which way the path elements are drawn to the canvas. When allAtOnce selected all path segments are drawn simultaneously. oneByOne paints every path segment one after another.		 LineAnimation.oneByOne
Â  LineAnimation.allAtOnce
animationOrder

Denotes the order in which the path elements are drawn to canvas when lineAnimation is set to LineAnimation.oneByOne. When no animationOrder is specified it defaults to the same order specified in the Svg asset or path array (PathOrder.original).		 PathOrders.original
Â  PathOrders.bottomToTop
Â  PathOrders.decreasingLength
Â  PathOrders.increasingLength
Â  PathOrders.leftToRight
Â  PathOrders.rightToLeft
Â  PathOrders.topToBottom
animationCurve

Easing curves are used to adjust the rate of change of an animation over time, allowing them to speed up and slow down, rather than moving at a constant rate. See Flutter docs.		 Curves.linear
Â  Curves.elasticOut
Â  Curves.bounceInOut
Â  Curves.decelerate
Â  Other Â 
onFinish

Callback when one animation cycle is finished. By default every animation repeats infinitely.		 Â  Â 
onPaint

Callback when a complete path is painted to the canvas. Returns with the relative index and the Path element itself.		 Â  Â 
range

Start and stop a animation from a certain moment in time by defining a AnimationRange object.		 Â  Â 
scaleToViewport

Path objects are scaled to the available viewport while maintaining the aspect ratio. Defaults to true.		 Â  Â
